questions.name: hearing_aid

questions.name: assistive_devices
questions.display_question: Do you use any assistive devices to get around, such as a cane, walker, crutches or wheelchair?

questions.name: help
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to help you with daily chores if you were sick?

questions.name: emotional_support
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem?

questions.name: enjoyable
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to do something enjoyable with?

questions.name: loved
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to love and make you feel wanted?

questions.name: interfere
questions.display_question: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting friends or relatives)?

questions.name: social_activity
questions.display_question: Compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months changed because of a change in your physical or emotional condition?

questions.name: social_comparison
questions.display_question: Compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems?

questions.display_question: How much weight have you lost?

questions.name: weight_gain
questions.display_question: How much weight have you gained?

questions.display_question: Are you basically satisfied with your life?

questions.display_question: Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?

questions.name: happy
questions.display_question: Do you feel happy most of the time?

questions.name: prefer_staying_home
questions.display_question: Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

questions.name: has_medications
questions.display_question: Are you taking any prescribed medications?

questions.name: num_medications
questions.display_question: Approximately how many different prescribed medications do you take each day?

questions.display_question: Are you taking any supplements, including herbals and vitamins?

questions.name: num_supplements
questions.display_question: Approximately how many herbs, vitamins and supplements do you take each day?

questions.display_question: What is your current marital status?

questions.name: living_situation
questions.display_question: What is your current living situation?

questions.name: education
questions.display_question: What is your highest level of education?

questions.name: smoked_30
questions.display_question: In the past 30 days, have you smoked cigarettes (even a single puff) or used other tobacco products?

questions.name: smoke_consider_quitting
questions.display_question: Are you willing to consider quittying?

questions.name: alcohol
questions.display_question: How many times in the past year have you had more than 4 drinks in a day if you are a woman, or 5 in a day if you are a man?

questions.name: home_health
questions.display_question: Do you have home care services now (such as a visiting nurse or home health aid)?

questions.name: assessment_taker
questions.display_question: Who completed this assessment?
answer_choices: I did it with some help
Someone else did it for me

current_question.name: weight_yes_no
current_question.display_question: In the past 6 months, has your weight changed?

conversation: Hello
Welcome to your health care questionnaire. Are you ready to start with the first question?
I am ready

Great! Let's start with the first question. Could you tell me how much your bathing has been limited by your health condition? The answer choices are: not limited, limited a little, or limited a lot. (id: 1)
limited a little
I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, could you tell me how much your dressing has been limited by your health condition? (id: 2)
limited a little
Alright, I've noted that down. Moving on, how much has your grooming been limited by your health condition? (id: 3)
limited a lot
I understand, thank you for letting me know. Now, could you tell me how much your feeding has been limited by your health condition? (id: 4)
not limited
Great, I'll note that as not limited. Now, could you tell me how much your walking inside the home has been limited by your health condition? (id: 5)
limited a little
I see, thank you for sharing. Now, could you tell me how much your walking outside the home has been limited by your health condition? (id: 6)
limited a lot
I understand. Now, could you tell me how much your bladder and bowel control has been limited by your health condition? (id: 7)
not limited
That's good to hear. Now, I'd like to know how independently you can use the telephone? (id: 8)
unable to do so
I understand. Let's move on to another daily task. How independently can you do your laundry? (id: 9)
with some help
I see. And how about shopping? Can you do that independently or do you need some help? (id: 10)
i sister comes with me
It's nice that your sister can assist you. So, how independently can you prepare meals? Would you say you can do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 11)
with some help
I see, it's good that you have some assistance. Now, how about housework? Can you do it independently or do you need some help? (id: 12)
i hire someone
That's a great way to manage it. Now, how independently can you handle your own medication? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 13)
my daughter organizes my medication
It sounds like your daughter is a great help. So, would you say you handle your medication with some help? (id: 13)
yeah
Great, it's good to have support. Now, have you ever fallen, like losing your balance, tripping, or dropping to the ground without control? (id: 14)
no
That's good to hear. Now, how would you describe your vision? Would you say it's excellent, good, fair, or poor? (id: 17)
fair
Alright, I've noted that down. Do you wear glasses? (id: 18)
no
Alright, I've noted that down. How would you describe your hearing? Is it excellent, good, fair, or poor? (id: 19)
good
That's good to hear. Do you use a hearing aid? (id: 20)
no
Alright, I've noted that down. Do you use any assistive devices to get around, such as a cane, walker, crutches or wheelchair? (id: 21)
crutches, wheelchair

I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, if you were sick and needed help with daily chores, how often do you have someone who could assist you? Would you say all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 22)
a little of the time

I understand. Now, how often do you have someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem? Would you say all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 23)
some of the time

Alright, I've noted that down. Now, how often do you have someone to do something enjoyable with? Would you say all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 24)
a little of the time
I see. Now, how often do you have someone to love and make you feel wanted? Would you say all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 25)
a little of the time

I understand. Now, during the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities like visiting friends or relatives? Would you say all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 26)
some of the time

I see. Now, compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months changed because of a change in your physical or emotional condition? Would you say it's much less, somewhat less, the same, somewhat more, or much more? (id: 27)
somewhat less

I understand. Now, compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems? Would you say they are much less, somewhat less, the same, somewhat more, or much more? (id: 28)
same

Alright, thank you for sharing that. Now, I'd like to ask about your weight. In the past 6 months, has your weight changed? Have you lost weight, gained weight, seen no change, or are you not sure? (id: 29)
